notes.body: Hello Aayush,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #656895511034138624-93878, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.     As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 16th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.     We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Aayush,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #656895511034138624-93878, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 16th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.

We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: ​​​​​Hello Santosh Kumar Nanda,    Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with regards to your order # 656558127417544704-55865, We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.     As per update received from our team, please be informed that due to wrong parcel delivered you had raised reutrn request against same,     Please note that the medicine will be collected within 24-48 hrs from the day the request is raised. Once medicine is pickeed up it will be returned to store within 3-5 working days, after that medicine will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 24-48. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your PharmEasy wallet (refund cash) in 24 hours.     I appreciate your patience in the meantime.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
​​​​​Hello Santosh Kumar Nanda,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with regards to your order # 656558127417544704-55865, We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.

As per update received from our team, please be informed that due to wrong parcel delivered you had raised reutrn request against same,

Please note that the medicine will be collected within 24-48 hrs from the day the request is raised. Once medicine is pickeed up it will be returned to store within 3-5 working days, after that medicine will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 24-48. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your PharmEasy wallet (refund cash) in 24 hours.
 
I appreciate your patience in the meantime.
 
We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.
 
For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!
 
Regards,
PharmEasy

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear Customer Care / Grievance Team,

I am writing this email out of extreme frustration after wasting more than
a day trying to reach one real human being from PharmEasy.

Let me be very clear upfront:

This is not a criticism of the founders, investors, or the idea behind
PharmEasy. This is a serious failure of the customer support team and the
systems they are running, which are actively damaging the company’s
credibility.

From yesterday onwards, I tried every possible method to reach support:


   -

   WhatsApp chat
   -

   In-app options
   -

   Feedback numbers
   -

   “Call this number” instructions

What I got in return was nothing but automated loops.

“Type Hi.”

“Call this number.”

“Restart the chat.”

No one answers. No one calls back. No escalation. No human support.

This is not customer service — this is deliberately blocking customers from
speaking to a person.

I had a genuine, time-sensitive query before placing a large order. I am
not from Bangalore, I am here temporarily, and my stay is uncertain — it
could be tomorrow, the day after, or a week later. I needed a simple
confirmation before proceeding.

Because no one was reachable, I had to drop the query altogether and move
on.

I have already traveled between Mumbai and Kerala, and I am done wasting
time chasing automated responses.

Instead of solving customer problems, your system seems designed to:


   -

   Push customers into leaving reviews
   -

   Send non-working numbers
   -

   Create an illusion of support while avoiding real accountability

This is exactly why people trust Amazon and Flipkart:

Because at the end of the day, you can speak to a human being.

PharmEasy has chosen the opposite approach — and it shows.

I know very well this email may not reach the CEO or leadership directly.
It will likely land with the same team responsible for this broken system.
But someone higher up needs to know that these practices are driving
customers away, not retaining them.

Healthcare is not e-commerce gimmickry.

If customers cannot reach support when they need clarity, they will leave —
and they already are.

I am sending this as formal feedback and grievance. Whether you act on it
or not will decide whether PharmEasy remains relevant to customers like me.

Unfortunately it’s an extreme failure PharmEasy. I lost even how much I
don’t know exactly, calling a customer service number which the IVR
answered and asked to wait to connect, but after waiting more than 20
minutes, it said we have a long queue and call later and disconnected.
Maybe the queue I believed because it won’t for orders instead a long queue
of customer to complain.

Regards,

Ameer Fouzi

9747580954

+971501580954 (WhatsApp)

--

and/or privileged material. The information contained in this e-mail is

notes.body: Hello Ameer,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  Thank you for your time on the call. Pursuant to our conversation, I hope to have addressed your concerns.      In the future, please contact our Level 1 customer service team via a call to 8071324888 or send an email to care@pharmeasy.in. If your query remains unresolved for 7 days after you have reached out to our Level 1 Customer support, you can escalate the matter to us.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels on the app or website listed in the "Need Help" section.  Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Safe.  Regards, Grievance Officer HelpDesk. ​

notes.body:
Dear PharmEasy Team,

I am writing to kindly request that you refrain from sending any further
WhatsApp messages to my number.

I initiated contact yesterday at 11:46 PM, by WhatsApp even before that I
tried calling, and the chat timestamps clearly reflect this. Even before
that, I had been adding items to my cart for several hours before. As of
7:46 PM today, the messages are still continuing.

I cannot spend my entire day engaging in automated chats or repeated
WhatsApp messages. I had genuine queries, but this ongoing communication
has become overwhelming and unproductive.

I humbly request that you respect my time and privacy and stop all WhatsApp
communications immediately.

Please.

Regards,

Ameer

notes.body_html:
Dear PharmEasy Team,
I am writing to kindly request that you refrain from sending any further WhatsApp messages to my number.
I initiated contact yesterday at 11:46 PM, by WhatsApp even before that I tried calling, and the chat timestamps clearly reflect this. Even before that, I had been adding items to my cart for several hours before. As of 7:46 PM today, the messages are still continuing.
I cannot spend my entire day engaging in automated chats or repeated WhatsApp messages. I had genuine queries, but this ongoing communication has become overwhelming and unproductive.
I humbly request that you respect my time and privacy and stop all WhatsApp communications immediately.
Please.
Regards,
Ameer

In the future, please contact our Level 1 customer service team via a call to 8071324888 or send an email to care@pharmeasy.in. If your query remains unresolved for 7 days after you have reached out to our Level 1 Customer support, you can escalate the matter to us. 
 
For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels on the app or website listed in the "Need Help" section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Safe.

Regards,
Grievance Officer HelpDesk. ​

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear Customer Care / Grievance Team,

I am writing this email out of extreme frustration after wasting more than
a day trying to reach one real human being from PharmEasy.

Let me be very clear upfront:

This is not a criticism of the founders, investors, or the idea behind
PharmEasy. This is a serious failure of the customer support team and the
systems they are running, which are actively damaging the company’s
credibility.

From yesterday onwards, I tried every possible method to reach support:


   -

   WhatsApp chat
   -

   In-app options
   -

   Feedback numbers
   -

   “Call this number” instructions

What I got in return was nothing but automated loops.

“Type Hi.”

“Call this number.”

“Restart the chat.”

No one answers. No one calls back. No escalation. No human support.

This is not customer service — this is deliberately blocking customers from
speaking to a person.

I had a genuine, time-sensitive query before placing a large order. I am
not from Bangalore, I am here temporarily, and my stay is uncertain — it
could be tomorrow, the day after, or a week later. I needed a simple
confirmation before proceeding.

Because no one was reachable, I had to drop the query altogether and move
on.

I have already traveled between Mumbai and Kerala, and I am done wasting
time chasing automated responses.

Instead of solving customer problems, your system seems designed to:


   -

   Push customers into leaving reviews
   -

   Send non-working numbers
   -

   Create an illusion of support while avoiding real accountability

This is exactly why people trust Amazon and Flipkart:

Because at the end of the day, you can speak to a human being.

PharmEasy has chosen the opposite approach — and it shows.

I know very well this email may not reach the CEO or leadership directly.
It will likely land with the same team responsible for this broken system.
But someone higher up needs to know that these practices are driving
customers away, not retaining them.

Healthcare is not e-commerce gimmickry.

If customers cannot reach support when they need clarity, they will leave —
and they already are.

I am sending this as formal feedback and grievance. Whether you act on it
or not will decide whether PharmEasy remains relevant to customers like me.

Unfortunately it’s an extreme failure PharmEasy. I lost even how much I
don’t know exactly, calling a customer service number which the IVR
answered and asked to wait to connect, but after waiting more than 20
minutes, it said we have a long queue and call later and disconnected.
Maybe the queue I believed because it won’t for orders instead a long queue
of customer to complain.

Regards,

Ameer Fouzi

9747580954

+971501580954 (WhatsApp)

--

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Serious Customer Support Failure – Lost Order, Lost Trust, and Lost Future Business
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Dear Customer Care / Grievance Team,
I am writing this email out of extreme frustration after wasting more than a day trying to reach one real human being from PharmEasy.
Let me be very clear upfront:
This is not a criticism of the founders, investors, or the idea behind PharmEasy. This is a serious failure of the customer support team and the systems they are running, which are actively damaging the company’s credibility.
From yesterday onwards, I tried every possible method to reach support:
  • WhatsApp chat
  • In-app options
  • Feedback numbers
  • “Call this number” instructions
What I got in return was nothing but automated loops.
“Type Hi.”
“Call this number.”
“Restart the chat.”
No one answers. No one calls back. No escalation. No human support.
This is not customer service — this is deliberately blocking customers from speaking to a person.
I had a genuine, time-sensitive query before placing a large order. I am not from Bangalore, I am here temporarily, and my stay is uncertain — it could be tomorrow, the day after, or a week later. I needed a simple confirmation before proceeding.
Because no one was reachable, I had to drop the query altogether and move on.
I have already traveled between Mumbai and Kerala, and I am done wasting time chasing automated responses.
Instead of solving customer problems, your system seems designed to:
  • Push customers into leaving reviews
  • Send non-working numbers
  • Create an illusion of support while avoiding real accountability
This is exactly why people trust Amazon and Flipkart:
Because at the end of the day, you can speak to a human being.
PharmEasy has chosen the opposite approach — and it shows.
I know very well this email may not reach the CEO or leadership directly. It will likely land with the same team responsible for this broken system. But someone higher up needs to know that these practices are driving customers away, not retaining them.
Healthcare is not e-commerce gimmickry.
If customers cannot reach support when they need clarity, they will leave — and they already are.
I am sending this as formal feedback and grievance. Whether you act on it or not will decide whether PharmEasy remains relevant to customers like me.
Unfortunately it’s an extreme failure PharmEasy. I lost even how much I don’t know exactly, calling a customer service number which the IVR answered and asked to wait to connect, but after waiting more than 20 minutes, it said we have a long queue and call later and disconnected. Maybe the queue I believed because it won’t for orders instead a long queue of customer to complain.
Regards,
Ameer Fouzi
9747580954
+971501580954 (WhatsApp)

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Hello,
I am writing regarding *Complaint Number 22255630* and *Order ID
654750338689531904-62591*.

I received a defective product, *FixDERMA Tinted Lip Balm SPF 50*,
delivered on December 6, 2025. The lip balm is unusable as the product does
not dispense from the tube.

Your team confirmed on December 9, 2025 that a return pickup would be
completed within 48 hours and that the refund would be processed post
verification. As of today, the product has not been picked up, and no
communication or confirmed timeline has been shared despite multiple
follow-ups on December 11 and December 12.

Additionally, I received a message stating the issue was resolved, which is
incorrect as neither pickup nor refund has occurred.

This is a clear breach of your stated service timelines. I am requesting
one of the following actions within the next 24 hours:

   1.

   Immediate processing of the refund without further pickup delays, or
   2.

   A confirmed pickup date and time window, followed by prompt refund
   processing as committed.

If this issue remains unresolved, I will escalate the matter through the
National Consumer Helpline and other appropriate consumer grievance
channels.

Please treat this as a final notice and share a definitive resolution.

Thanks & Regards,

*Mrs. Rupam Kumar*

*Please excuse the brevity, typos and/or errors; I have sent this from a
mobile device. Thanks.*

--

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Final notice regarding unresolved return and refund – Complaint 22255630
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Hello,
I am writing regarding Complaint Number 22255630 and Order ID 654750338689531904-62591.
I received a defective product, FixDERMA Tinted Lip Balm SPF 50, delivered on December 6, 2025. The lip balm is unusable as the product does not dispense from the tube.
Your team confirmed on December 9, 2025 that a return pickup would be completed within 48 hours and that the refund would be processed post verification. As of today, the product has not been picked up, and no communication or confirmed timeline has been shared despite multiple follow-ups on December 11 and December 12.
Additionally, I received a message stating the issue was resolved, which is incorrect as neither pickup nor refund has occurred.
This is a clear breach of your stated service timelines. I am requesting one of the following actions within the next 24 hours:
  1. Immediate processing of the refund without further pickup delays, or
  2. A confirmed pickup date and time window, followed by prompt refund processing as committed.
If this issue remains unresolved, I will escalate the matter through the National Consumer Helpline and other appropriate consumer grievance channels.
Please treat this as a final notice and share a definitive resolution.

Thanks & Regards,

Mrs. Rupam Kumar

Please excuse the brevity, typos and/or errors; I have sent this from a mobile device. Thanks.

notes.body: Hello Mrs. Rupam,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     I understand your concern with regard to the order ID #654750338689531904-62591. Accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused to you.     As per the courier team update, as there is a delay in pick up from the courier partner, we have processed a manual refund of Rs 284.05 to the original source on 15th December 2025. It will be credited within 5 - 7 working days.        I have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.   Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Neeha

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Re: Expression of Interest:pharmeasy Franchise in Patna-Bihar
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I hope this message finds you well.

I am writing to express my interest in associating with Pharmeasy as a partner in the Patna-Bihar region. I am now keen to enter the healthcare and medicine distribution space with a reputed and trusted brand like Pharmeasy.

I request you to please share details of the available franchise , including:
- Eligibility criteria and documentation requirements  
- Investment and infrastructure requirements  
- Commercial terms, commissions, and support provided by pharmeasy.
- Application and approval process, along with expected timelines  

I will be grateful if you could also confirm the correct official channel (email, portal or form) through which I should submit my detailed application and documents, so that I can avoid any unofficial or fraudulent contacts.

Kindly let me know the next steps and the appropriate team/contact person to take this discussion forward.

Warm regards,  
Gautam Rajesh
Patna,Bihar  
Mobile Number-8320015494

notes.body: Hello Kunal,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     Thank you for showing an interest in working as a partner with us.     Please click on the link below and fill in the requisite details:  https://pharmeasy.in/franchisestores     Kindly note that once the form is filled request you to kindly wait for 5 business days for the call, as there are certain conditions that our team will need to check before they connect with you to discuss your interest further.     If you do not receive a call or email to take this further, it means that your partner's request has not been considered.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.   Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Neeha
notes.body_html:
Hello Kunal,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
Thank you for showing an interest in working as a partner with us.
 
Please click on the link below and fill in the requisite details:
https://pharmeasy.in/franchisestores
 
Kindly note that once the form is filled request you to kindly wait for 5 business days for the call, as there are certain conditions that our team will need to check before they connect with you to discuss your interest further.

If you do not receive a call or email to take this further, it means that your partner's request has not been considered.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Neeha

notes.body: Hello Divyansh,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #658924715832336384-83129.     We have received an update from our logistics team. As per the update, your order has been delivered to you. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you. We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.     Please consider this as a one-off instance as we aim to provide the best of services to our customers and such instances are very rare.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. PharmEasy looks forward to bettering your experience in the future.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,   PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Divyansh,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #658924715832336384-83129.
 
We have received an update from our logistics team. As per the update, your order has been delivered to you. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you. We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.
 
Please consider this as a one-off instance as we aim to provide the best of services to our customers and such instances are very rare.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. PharmEasy looks forward to bettering your experience in the future.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards, 
PharmEasy

notes.body: Damaged Medicine Issue / Return Follow up
notes.body_html: Damaged Medicine Issue / Return Follow up

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear PharmEasy Customer Care Team,

This email is being written out of *extreme frustration and anger* due to
the complete failure of PharmEasy in handling my order *(Order ID:
652728813754114048)*. The level of negligence shown in this case is
unacceptable for a platform that claims to deliver essential medicines.

The order was scheduled for delivery by *29th November*, yet it was
delivered only on *5th December*, causing a *6-day delay*. These were *critical
heart medications*, and such a delay is not just an inconvenience — it
is a *serious
lapse in responsibility* that could have had dangerous consequences.

Because of your delivery partner’s incompetence and the pharmacy team’s
lack of coordination, I was forced to *travel more than 16 km* to the
courier partner’s office to collect the medicines myself. This completely
defeats the purpose of using an online pharmacy and caused *mental stress,
physical strain, time loss, and additional expense*.

To make matters worse, when I raised a complaint, I was *explicitly assured*
by your pharmacy team that a *₹300 compensation* would be credited *after
delivery*. Despite the delivery being completed, *no compensation has been
credited till date*, which raises serious questions about the credibility
of your customer support commitments.

I demand an *immediate investigation* into:

   1. The unjustified 6-day delay
   2. The failure of the delivery partner
   3. The false assurance regarding compensation

Given the gravity of the issue, I am expecting a *fair and reasonable
compensation of ₹600 (₹100 per day of delay)*, along with an explanation
for why the previously promised compensation was never credited.

If this issue is not resolved promptly, I will be left with no option but
to *escalate this complaint to higher authorities and consumer grievance
platforms*, as this incident involves *essential medicines and patient
safety*.

I expect a *written response and resolution without further delay*.

Regards,
*Ajas Ibrahim*
Registered Mobile Number: 8547229698

--

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Serious Complaint: 6-Day Delay & Missing Compensation – Order ID 652728813754114048
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Dear PharmEasy Customer Care Team,
This email is being written out of extreme frustration and anger due to the complete failure of PharmEasy in handling my order (Order ID: 652728813754114048). The level of negligence shown in this case is unacceptable for a platform that claims to deliver essential medicines.
The order was scheduled for delivery by 29th November, yet it was delivered only on 5th December, causing a 6-day delay. These were critical heart medications, and such a delay is not just an inconvenience — it is a serious lapse in responsibility that could have had dangerous consequences.
Because of your delivery partner’s incompetence and the pharmacy team’s lack of coordination, I was forced to travel more than 16 km to the courier partner’s office to collect the medicines myself. This completely defeats the purpose of using an online pharmacy and caused mental stress, physical strain, time loss, and additional expense.
To make matters worse, when I raised a complaint, I was explicitly assured by your pharmacy team that a ₹300 compensation would be credited after delivery. Despite the delivery being completed, no compensation has been credited till date, which raises serious questions about the credibility of your customer support commitments.
I demand an immediate investigation into:
  1. The unjustified 6-day delay
  2. The failure of the delivery partner
  3. The false assurance regarding compensation
Given the gravity of the issue, I am expecting a fair and reasonable compensation of ₹600 (₹100 per day of delay), along with an explanation for why the previously promised compensation was never credited.
If this issue is not resolved promptly, I will be left with no option but to escalate this complaint to higher authorities and consumer grievance platforms, as this incident involves essential medicines and patient safety.
I expect a written response and resolution without further delay.
Regards,
Ajas Ibrahim
Registered Mobile Number: 8547229698

Regarding your order #658895293595082752-93542, we would like to inform you that a return request has already been raised for one quantity of PROHANCE JUNIOR NUTRITION POWDER VANILLA 200G . Our records indicate that the medication was picked up on December 17, 2025.     Upon returning the medicine, our partner retailer at the store will verify it. The refund process will then commence and be completed within 48 business hours. Additionally, once the refund is initiated, it will be reflected in your original source account within 7-10 business days.     We appreciate your patience in the meantime. Once the return process has been completed, we kindly request that you reach out to us again to initiate a new return request.     If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, on the App or website, listed in the "Need Help" section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. notes.body_html:
Hello Ravi,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

Regarding your order #658895293595082752-93542, we would like to inform you that a return request has already been raised for one quantity of PROHANCE JUNIOR NUTRITION POWDER VANILLA 200G . Our records indicate that the medication was picked up on December 17, 2025.

Upon returning the medicine, our partner retailer at the store will verify it. The refund process will then commence and be completed within 48 business hours. Additionally, once the refund is initiated, it will be reflected in your original source account within 7-10 business days.

We appreciate your patience in the meantime. Once the return process has been completed, we kindly request that you reach out to us again to initiate a new return request.

If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, on the App or website, listed in the "Need Help" section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear Partner,

Greetings from the *KreditBee App* team.

We are currently reviewing UPI payment experiences across our merchant
ecosystem with the objective of ensuring a *seamless and consistent
checkout journey for users*.

During this review, we noticed that in payment flows on your app, end users
are not able to view *all UPI apps installed on their device* while making
a payment. We wanted to take this opportunity to share guidance issued by
NPCI, which encourages online merchants to display a *“Pay by any UPI App”*
option and enable visibility of all active UPI apps
through UPI Intent (guideline circular attached).

These guidelines are intended to promote interoperability across the UPI
ecosystem and help provide customers with greater choice and ease of
payment.

We kindly request you to *review your current checkout implementation* and
include *KreditBee app *in the available UPI payment options. If any
changes are required, our team would be happy to collaborate and support
you through the process.

We truly appreciate your efforts in delivering a smooth payment experience
to our shared users.

Please feel free to reach out if you have any questions or would like to
discuss this further.


Regards,
Prateek Maliwal
KreditBee App

-- 




**DISCLAIMER :**

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Request to align UPI checkout flow with NPCI interoperability guidelines
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Dear Partner,
Greetings from the KreditBee App team.
We are currently reviewing UPI payment experiences across our merchant ecosystem with the objective of ensuring a seamless and consistent checkout journey for users.
During this review, we noticed that in payment flows on your app, end users are not able to view all UPI apps installed on their device while making a payment. We wanted to take this opportunity to share guidance issued by NPCI, which encourages online merchants to display a “Pay by any UPI App” option and enable visibility of all active UPI apps
through UPI Intent (guideline circular attached).
These guidelines are intended to promote interoperability across the UPI ecosystem and help provide customers with greater choice and ease of payment.
We kindly request you to review your current checkout implementation and include KreditBee app in the available UPI payment options. If any changes are required, our team would be happy to collaborate and support you through the process.
We truly appreciate your efforts in delivering a smooth payment experience to our shared users.
Please feel free to reach out if you have any questions or would like to discuss this further.

Regards,
Prateek Maliwal
KreditBee App
